InstalledItem.Name: SW16BR3 “Shredder” Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Ballistic Repeater
Size: 3

Blast your way out of trouble with this Behring size three ballistic repeater. The SW16BR3 "Shredder" distributes heat across both barrels to keep it firing when needed most. The weapon's shot grouping and damage falloff make it most deadly at medium or close range.

InstalledItem.Name: M5A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 3

When energy autocannons are designed, Behring's M5A provides the standard to which they are measured against, owing to its long range of engagement and low damage fallout.

InstalledItem.Name: M5A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon

When energy autocannons are designed, Behring's M5A provides the standard to which they are measured against, owing to its long range of engagement and low damage fallout.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-212 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 2
Missiles: 1xS2

Behring’s MSD-212 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 2 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of one S2 missile.

InstalledItem.Name: StrikeForce II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 2

The StrikeForce is the latest culmination of Thermyte Concern's expansion into the missile industry, showcasing notable design and cross-section targeting improvements.

InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Seal Corporation
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Tried, tested, and refined for centuries, the WEB shield generator balances sleek design with stellar performance to keep your ship safe under a wide variety of circumstances.

The PowerBolt provides all the power and performance you need for your journey through the stars. You can trust Lightning Power to get you there.

InstalledItem.Name: ArcticStorm
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

If you’re after a cooler that balances performance, durability and stealth, then look to the ArcticStorm. This mid-grade cooler from Lightning Power Ltd uses their centuries old technology to provide performance that can be relied upon.
